arStrings.szText: "I was told you might be interested in this."
Ah, yes. One man's junk is another... you know.
What a lucky find! You were right to come to me! This ring has a dark history of greed. Lustrous upon first glance, but ultimately worthless to sell...
Excited realization as he's presented an item, then continuing as if spinning an epic tale. He's a bit dramatic.
And what's worse, whosoever covets and steals the ring is cursed, marking them for death.
Continues recounting the lore of the item he's been presented. A bit dramatic and spooky
I do hope however it came into your possession, it was given freely! But probably best I hang onto it, just to be safe.
Teasing, a bit gleefully. Then knowingly reassuring
Do come around again, should you acquire any more interesting pieces.
Cryptic and devious, with emphasis on "interesting"
